June 14, 2017 - Second Anniversary Happy Hour

Hey y’all! We’re pleased to announce our next event celebrating the second anniversary of the Austin Apple Admins meetup group!

On June 14th, 2017, we are planning a happy hour at The Beer Plant! Bring your friends, co-workers, significant others, and anyone else that might enjoy a fun night at The Beer Plant. We’d appreciate an RSVP so we can make sure we snag enough tables for everyone to sit together.

Registration

Registration is now available using the EventBrite details below.

If you have any questions please email Emily.

See you there!
